alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 02 at 9:56AM MST until March 03 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for 12 PM through 8 PM MST Thursday for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zone 237 which includes Baca County... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MST THURSDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MST Thursday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 237. * Winds...South 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 6 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands
